casebody.data:
AZURE DOLPHIN, LLC, et al.
v.
BARTON, et al. 128A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 18, 2018 Peter J. Juran, Attorney at Law, M. Rachael Dimont, Attorney at Law, Chad Archer, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Azure Dolphin, LLC, et al. Alan M. Ruley, Attorney at Law, Andrew A. Freeman, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Barton, Justin, et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 16th of May 2018 by Plaintiffs:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of May 2018."

Plaintiffs shall have up to and including the 15th day of June 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
